intro: Psychotria tolimensis, commonly known as the Tolima Psychotria, is a species of flowering plant native to the Andean region of Colombia. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes over 13,000 species of mostly flowering plants. The plant is characterized by its dark green, elliptical leaves and small, clustered white flowers. It is often found in humid, shaded environments within cloud forests. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered a rare and potentially endangered species.
